availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Malinda Meek Ward (Johnson County, Kentucky, resident)

body.p: Johnson County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Married to Jonathan Ward. Mother of Solomon S. Ward, Zina Ward, and Jonathan Ward. Farmer in Floyd County, Kentucky, in 1840. Resident of Johnson County in 1850. Resident of Johnson County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Sixth Manuscript Census of the United States (1840), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Floyd County, p. 283.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Johnson County, p. 111B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Johnson County Marriages, 1803-1883, Film #001912950, p. 192 of 239 of microfilm.
